entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash on startup with iOS Release #24618
  • can not start first app on maui on macOS #24617
  • iOS <button> onclick event not firing with linker behavior set to 'Link Framework SDKs Only' #24616
  • Microsoft.Maui.Core.props" could not be loaded. The process cannot access the file #24615
    Backlog
  • System.ArgumentException occurs with Font Family in Win2D Controls on Windows in VS Code #24609
  • iOS/Windows touch inputs sent to controls behind #24608
  • mono_gc_run_finalize iOS crash #24607
  • Button control IsEnabled property not working when value is set to False. #24604
  • CollectionView with SwipeView items behave strangely #24603
  • CheckBox Bug(for Android) #24602

Closed

  • .NET MAUI iOS 18 Issue #24612
  • [Android] NullReferenceException in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #13825
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Class Libraries throw Exception when building for MacCatalyst #24595

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10174699 #24619
  • Add DotNetPurple as a named color #24614
  • Regenerate the shipped and unshipped API files #24613
  • Remove duplicate versions of tests #24611
  • [iOS] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    community ✨
  • Use some of the new iOS APIs #24605

Merged

  • Revert "Fix SafeArea adjustments" #24600
    fixed-in-net8.0-nightly
  • Renamed Github5623.cs in TestCases.HostApp to Github5623.xaml.cs #24598
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly
  • Use the IsRefreshing property directly #24597
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs, fixed-in-net8.0-nightly

Updated

  • [Draft] Restore Localization #24599
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest #24586
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, 9.0-rc2
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing
  • Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, s/pr-needs-author-input, area-controls-editor
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, do-not-merge, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] SwipeView: Fix reenabling parent scrolling after cancelled swipe #23442
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Resolved Text Jump Issue in Entry Control with HorizontalTextAlignment Set to End #24485
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView single item horizontal alignment issue when using ItemsLayout with a Footer. #24564
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Improve Android device type check and improve UI Test cake scripts #24495
    area-testing
  • [IOS] - Fix error when running new template maui app on iOS #24567
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix Android FlyoutPage crash when changing orientation of tablet #24394
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [C] Allow OnIdiom/OnPlatform to return a Binding #24594
  • [ci] Build public #24388
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Remove netPrevious TFMs from RC/GA #24488
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
  • Fix Android flyout button (burger) visibility not reevaluated when orientation changes #24469
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [Android] Encoding webview's source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
